info.author: H. Turgut Uyar
info.description:
This is a `docutils`_ plugin for generating custom HTML output.
It has the following differences from the default generator:

- It doesn't add custom classes like "docutils", "container",
  "simple", "head", "external", and "reference".

- It generates "section" tags for sections instead of "div"
  tags with "section" class attribute.

- It generates "br" tags instead of "div" tags
  with "line-block" and "line" class attributes.

- It doesn't use a leading blank when closing empty tags
  with "/>".

To use it, select the "tekirhtml" writer.

.. _docutils: http://docutils.sourceforge.net/
info.name: docutils-tekirhtml
info.html_description:
This is a docutils plugin for generating custom HTML output. It has the following differences from the default generator:

  • It doesn’t add custom classes like “docutils”, “container”, “simple”, “head”, “external”, and “reference”.
  • It generates “section” tags for sections instead of “div” tags with “section” class attribute.
  • It generates “br” tags instead of “div” tags with “line-block” and “line” class attributes.
  • It doesn’t use a leading blank when closing empty tags with “/>”.

To use it, select the “tekirhtml” writer.
